TriggerOraclev10g.name: TRG_DATEGEN_INS_BEFORE_ROW
TriggerOraclev10g.body: BEGIN<br/>-- :NEW.medgenadm := TRUNC(:NEW.medgenlic * 0.6 + :NEW.medgenbac * 0.4, 2) ;<br/>/*<br/> IF :NEW.buget_stat = 'N' AND :NEW.buget_nrsem > 0 THEN<br/> :NEW.buget_nrsem := 0 ; <br/> END IF ;<br/> IF :NEW.bursa_stud = 'N' AND :NEW.bursa_nrsem > 0 THEN<br/> :NEW.bursa_nrsem := 0 ; <br/> END IF ;<br/>*/<br/> NULL ;<br/>END ;<br/>
